content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [Load].[ClaimDetails]
( 
	[ClaimFIRNo] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[Injury] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[ClaimType] [bit]  NULL,
	[ClaimCategory] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[AmountBilled] [money]  NULL,
	[AmountNet] [money]  NULL,
	[AmountPaid] [money]  NULL,
	[DoctorName] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[DoctorCity] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[ClaimFormDetailId] [int]  NULL,
	[IntimationId] [int]  NULL,
	[HospitalId] [int]  NULL,
	[ClaimStatusId] [int]  NULL,
	[PlaceofServiceId] [int]  NULL,
	[DateofService] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DatePaid] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateReceived] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateofAdmit] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateofInjury] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateofDocumentation] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateofDischarge] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DateModified] [datetime]  NULL,
	[WorkflowSequenceId] [int]  NULL,
	[MemberDetailId] [int]  NULL,
	[ClassofAccommodation] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[HospitalizationType] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[Corporate] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[ClaimId] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [ClaimId] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
